properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NICKNAME, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ENROLL_DATE, MEMBER_DEL_FL FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_PW = ?
INSERT INTO MEMBER(MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NICKNAME, ENROLL_DATE, MEMBER_DEL_FL) VALUES (SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
